---
title: "Order Book Analytics Database"
---


**O**rder **B**ook **A**nalytics **D**atabase (OBADiah) contains the following high-freqency data from several cryptocurency exchanges:

* An order book updates at various level of details, up to an individual order events where available
* Matches (trades)
* Level1 changes or spread
* Level2 changes or depth

Using these data someone can:

* Explore their visual reprsentation 
* Verify whether the claims made in a published research are valid for cryptocurrencies
* Produce an original research
* Develop and backtest trading strategies
